titles.title: End Discriminatory State Taxes for Automobile Renters Act of 2013
To protect consumers from discriminatory State taxes on motor vehicle rentals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/27/2013--Introduced. End Discriminatory State Taxes for Automobile Renters Act of 2013 - Prohibits states or local governments from levying or collecting a discriminatory tax (generally, a tax or tax assessment that is applicable to the rental of motor vehicles or motor vehicle businesses or property, but not to the majority of other rentals of tangible personal property within a state or locality) on the rental of motor vehicles, motor vehicle rental businesses, or motor vehicle rental property.
